snippet.title: Hotel Hustle | Release Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Welcome to the most bustling place in the world. Important notice: no, you can’t hide the bell from the guests. Yes, they will keep ringing it. Your role here will be to take care of the hotel and attend to guests and all their needs for the duration of their stay.

Available now on the Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hotel-hustle-switch/

Don't forget to follow us on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedDeer_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedDeerGames
and Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reddeer_games/
